topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5577ba696368725c35002188#post_5577ba696368725c35002188
I see you were around the vicinity of the murder sir.

"...I was jogging literally seven miles away"

Sorry sir but judging by how you deleted your internet history you are obstructing justice, sir. 

"THATS LITERALLY A FUNCTION FOR ANY WEB BROWSER, THEY _LET_ YOU DELETE YOUR HYSTORY FOR PRIVACY REASONS"

Sorry sir, but we're going to have to take you in for -Convenience- upholding the law. 

*The prison is literally stacked to the brim with innocent people*

"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5577bec663687262070020dc#post_5577bec663687262070020dc
I know this isn't strictly related to gay anime porn video games, which we need more of, but I think you'd appreciate this thought.

I really, really want an action game with a flamboyantly, obnoxiously gay protagonist. I want a hero who kicks the shit out of monsters or whatever in a completely serious, if over the top way, while at the same time being catty and campy and just generally not taking the situation seriously at all.

topics.body:
I don't know why, but the idea of some of the dinosaurs just being giant birds just, bothers me. And I like birds.

I still just don't understand it. So like, were they just feathered reptiles, or, what? Make up your mind people. 

I guess its just because I've Vision them them to look differently this whole time its really hard to look at them otherwise.
